page.title: 08GARAGES IN DISTINGTON
page.content:
{GATES TYRES } Gates Tyres has been in Distington for 15 years.They sell exhausts,tyres and 4 wheel drive Duster cars.It employs 10-11 people,it is open 6 days a week and they work an 8 hour day.
{MYERS AND BOWMANS} Myers and Bowmans opened in 1948. They work an 8 hour day 6 days a week. 55 people are employed,25 from Distington.They are stockists of Peugeot Talbot and Toyota,they also sell petrol and service cars.
{DISTINGTON MOTORS } They sell petrol Gates supply the tyres.He has 3 workers who work a six hour day.They repair cars,do servicing and MOT Testing.It is owned by Mr Briggs and his partner.
